metadata.title: Usage - Operator - HTTP API
metadata.description:
The /operator/usage endpoint returns usage information about the number of
services, service instances and mesh-enabled service instances by
datacenter.

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
